# N-Of-1 (Single Subject Design)

This is a N-Of-1 R package under development. Can use devtools to install the package.

# To Install

```{r}
library(devtools)
install_github("MikeJSeo/nof1")
```

# To Run

```{r}
library(jsonlite)
library(nof1)

json.file <- "sample input.json" 
#json.file <- "sample input-with some NA.json"
#json.file <- "sample input-same data.json"
#json.file <- "sample input-missing baseline.json" 
#json.file <- "sample input-minimum data.json" 
#json.file <- "sample input-inverse.json" 
result <- wrap(json.file)
result
```

Thank you,
